column5: First floor-SENIORS/FAMILY ONLY Conveniently located right in the heart of the Island's entertainment district, four blocks Louie's Backyard, Laguna Bobs and Coconuts. Book your next fishing trip at Fisherman's wharf just one block north of Louie's. Living area features a large tv, full size sofa sleeper and recliner. Kitchen features full size refrigerator, stove, microwave, coffeemaker and complete set of everything for meals. Swimming pool, covered parking for one vehicle. NO SPRING BREAKERS
column8: La Perla#1 Mid-island 2-3 minute walk beach acc.
